When its first minivans hit the market in 1983, Chrysler caught its competitors by surprise- and that's just what Sergio Marchionne hopes to do with its next-generation vans. We're not going to give one inch of territory in terms of our domination of[ the minivan] segment, Sergio Marchionne told workers yesterday at Chrysler's Windsor Assembly Plant, where both the Chrysler Town& Country and Dodge Grand Caravan are built.
